meanings.sent1: The ripply road ahead made the car ride bumpy.
meanings.sent2: The ripply pattern on the wallpaper added a sense of movement to the room.
meanings.sent3: The ripply sound of the wind through the trees was oddly calming.

meanings.sent5: Her ripply laughter filled the room with joy.
